metadata.Title: CVE-2021-4020 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
janus-gateway is vulnerable to Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting')

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4020` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

janus - 1.0.4-1
janus-demos - 1.0.4-1
janus-tools - 1.0.4-1
libjs-janus-gateway - 1.0.4-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: janus package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.0.4-1').
